short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension to calculate the tailpipe carbon dioxide emissions eliminated by driving an electric vehicle

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter the number of miles you have driven in an electric vehicle, and Green Tea will show you how many kilograms of tailpipe carbon dioxide emissions you have eliminated by doing so.
